attributes.action: Driving instructors to sign off all manoeuvres and hill starts
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government/parliament to do it so it takes the waiting time for a driving test down and more learner drivers will be less frustrated at the waiting time. It will take the pressure off driving examiners
attributes.background: Allow driving instructors to sign off on manoeuvres and hill starts so that gives driving examiners more time to do more tests by doing 30 minute tests
